preamble: In this section you will decrobe the experimental design and sample, such as experimental condition and trial number per condition, number of participants, participant exclusion and presenting software.
question: How many subjects participated in the study?
How many participants, in total, were included in the analysis, after exclusion participants with bad data?
Specify reasons for excluding participants.
How many experimental/comparison (between-subjects) groups did the study feature?
Specify group names separated by semicolon and a space (e.g., test group; control group)
How many participants did each group have after exclusion?
details: Input numeric values in the same order in which groups were listed in the previous section. Values should be separated by semicolon and a space.

question: How many within-subject conditions did the study have?
Specify condition names separated by semicolon and a space (e.g., match; mismatch).
What determined the number of trials each subject was presented with?
choices: fixed N of trials delivered | adaptive N of trials (e.g., presenting trials with behavioural errors again until correct response) | Other

question: How many trials in total was each subject presented with (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
How many trials did each condition feature (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
details: Values should be separated by semicolon and a space and given in the same order as the conditions were listed earlier. If there are multiple groups of participants, list trial counts for all conditions for one group, and then for the next one - following the ordering of groups as you specified them earlier.

question: Explain how it was determined how many trials a participant was presented with.
How many trials on average was a participant presented with, in total (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
What was the minimum number of trials a participant was presented with, in total  (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
What was the maximum number of trials a participant was presented with, in total  (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
How many trials on average was a participant presented with, per condition  (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
details: Values should be separated by semicolon and a space and given in the same order as the conditions were listed earlier. If there are multiple groups of participants, list trial counts for all conditions for one group, and then for the next one - following the ordering of groups as you specified them earlier.

question: What was the minimum number of trials a participant was presented with, per condition (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
details: Values should be separated by semicolon and a space and given in the same order as the conditions were listed earlier. If there are multiple groups of participants, list trial counts for all conditions for one group, and then for the next one - following the ordering of groups as you specified them earlier.

question: What was the maximum number of trials a participant was presented with, per condition  (including repetition of the same stimuli or trials)?
details: Values should be separated by semicolon and a space and given in the same order as the conditions were listed earlier. If there are multiple groups of participants, list trial counts for all conditions for one group, and then for the next one - following the ordering of groups as you specified them earlier.

question: In your final analysis, how many trials, on average, did you include for each condition per subject?
details: Insert numbers for each condition, separated by a semicolon and a space, in the same order as the conditions were listed earlier. If there are multiple groups of participants, list trial counts for all conditions for one group, and then for the next one - following the ordering of groups as you specified them earlier

question: Specify the minimum number of trials analyzed per condition for any subject.
details: Values should be separated by semicolon and a space and given in the same order as the conditions were listed earlier. If there are multiple groups of participants, list trial counts for all conditions for one group, and then for the next one - following the ordering of groups as you specified them earlier.

question: Specify the maximum number of trials analyzed per condition for any subject.
details: Values should be separated by semicolon and a space and given in the same order as the conditions were listed earlier. If there are multiple groups of participants, list trial counts for all conditions for one group, and then for the next one - following the ordering of groups as you specified them earlier.

question: Which presenting software did you use to show your experimental task?
Specify software version if applicable, and software name and version if "other" was selected.
